text: Philosophy begins in wonder. And, at the end, when philosophic thought has done its best, the wonder remains.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

text: There is no end of craving. Hence contentment alone is the best way to happiness. Therefore, acquire contentment.
author: Sivananda

text: The large majority of the Negroes who have put on the finishing touches of our best colleges are all but worthless in the development of their people.
author: Carter G. Woodson

text: The best thing is to look natural, but it takes makeup to look natural.
author: Calvin Klein

text: Humor is one of the best ingredients of survival.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi
